00030 #if !defined(Apoxi_BidiManager_hpp)
00031 #define Apoxi_BidiManager_hpp

00035 #include <Kernel/Types.hpp>
00036 
00041 class BidiManager {
00042     public:
00043         enum CharType {
00044             NeutralType,
00045             LeftToRightType,
00046             RightToLeftType
00047         };
00048 
00049         struct ParagraphContext {
00050             WCHAR* dest_text;
00051             INT* dest_pos;
00052             INT* types;
00053             INT* levels;
00054             INT base_level;
00055             INT from;
00056             INT count;
00057         };
00058 
00060         static BidiManager* GetInstance();
00061 
00067         void SetActive(BOOLEAN flag) { m_is_active = flag; }
00068 
00070         BOOLEAN IsActive() const { return m_is_active; }
00071 
00073         ParagraphContext* BeginProcessing(const WCHAR* text, INT from = 0, INT count = -1);
00074 
00076         void EndProcessing(ParagraphContext* context);
00077 
00080         const WCHAR* GetConvertedText(ParagraphContext* context,
00081                                       INT from = 0,
00082                                       INT count = -1,
00083                                       INT* cursor_pos = 0);
00084 
00087         const INT* GetConvertedPositions(ParagraphContext* context,
00088                                          INT from = 0) const
00089         {
00090             if (!m_alloc_ok)
00091                 return 0;
00092             else
00093                 return &context->dest_pos[from];
00094         }
00095 
00101         INT RemoveFormattingCodes(WCHAR* text, INT char_count);
00102 
00104         CharType GetCharType(WCHAR chr) const;
00105 
00106     private:
00112         enum BidiType {
00113             ON = 0,  // Other Neutral  
00114             L,       // Left Letter 
00115             R,       // Right Letter 
00116             AN,      // Arabic Number
00117             EN,      // European Number
00118             AL,      // Arabic Letter (Right-to-left)
00119             NSM,     // Non-spacing Mark
00120             CS,      // Common Separator
00121             ES,      // European Separator
00122             ET,      // European Terminator (post/prefix e.g. $ and %)
00123     
00124             // resolved types
00125             BN,      // Boundary neutral (type of RLE etc after explicit levels)
00126     
00127             // input types, 
00128             S,       // Segment Separator (TAB) - used only in L1
00129             WS,      // White space - used only in L1
00130             B,       // Paragraph Separator (aka as PS)
00131     
00132             // types for explicit controls
00133             RLO,     // these are used only in X1-X9
00134             RLE,
00135             LRO,
00136             LRE,
00137             PDF,
00138 
00139             // resolved types, also resolved directions
00140             N = ON,  // alias, where ON, WS and S are treated the same
00141         };
00142 
00143         enum State {
00144             xa,     //  arabic letter            
00145             xr,     //  right leter           
00146             xl,     //  left letter           
00147                                                    
00148             ao,     //  arabic lett. foll by ON  
00149             ro,     //  right lett. foll by ON    
00150             lo,     //  left lett. foll by ON     
00151                                                    
00152             rt,     //  ET following R          
00153             lt,     //  ET following L        
00154                                                    
00155             cn,     //  EN, AN following AL      
00156             ra,     //  arabic number foll R    
00157             re,     //  european number foll R  
00158             la,     //  arabic number foll L    
00159             le,     //  european number foll L  
00160                                                    
00161             ac,     //  CS following cn          
00162             rc,     //  CS following ra       
00163             rs,     //  CS,ES following re       
00164             lc,     //  CS following la       
00165             ls,     //  CS,ES following le        
00166 
00167             ret,    //  ET following re
00168             let,    //  ET following le
00169         };
00170 
00171         enum Action {
00172             // primitives
00173             IX = 0x100,                 // increment
00174             XX = 0xF,                   // no-op
00175 
00176             // actions
00177             xxx = (XX << 4) + XX,       // no-op
00178             xIx = IX + xxx,             // increment run
00179             xxN = (XX << 4) + ON,       // set current to N
00180             xxE = (XX << 4) + EN,       // set current to EN
00181             xxA = (XX << 4) + AN,       // set current to AN
00182             xxR = (XX << 4) + R,        // set current to R
00183             xxL = (XX << 4) + L,        // set current to L
00184             Nxx = (ON << 4) + 0xF,      // set run to neutral
00185             Axx = (AN << 4) + 0xF,      // set run to AN
00186             ExE = (EN << 4) + EN,       // set run to EN, set current to EN
00187             NIx = (ON << 4) + 0xF + IX, // set run to N, increment
00188             NxN = (ON << 4) + ON,       // set run to N, set current to N
00189             NxR = (ON << 4) + R,        // set run to N, set current to R
00190             NxE = (ON << 4) + EN,       // set run to N, set current to EN
00191 
00192             AxA = (AN << 4) + AN,       // set run to AN, set current to AN
00193             NxL = (ON << 4) + L,        // set run to N, set current to L
00194             LxL = (L << 4) + L,         // set run to L, set current to L
00195         };
00196 
00197         enum ActionValue {
00198             // action to resolve previous input
00199             nL = L,         // resolve EN to L
00200             En = 3 << 4,    // resolve neutrals run to embedding level direction
00201             Rn = R << 4,    // resolve neutrals run to strong right
00202             Ln = L << 4,    // resolved neutrals run to strong left
00203             In = (1<<8),    // increment count of deferred neutrals
00204             LnL = (1<<4)+L, // set run and EN to L
00205         };
00206 
00207         enum StateValue {
00208             r,  // R and characters resolved to R
00209             l,  // L and characters resolved to L
00210             rn, // N preceded by right
00211             ln, // N preceded by left
00212             a,  // AN preceded by left (the abbrev 'la' is used up above)
00213             na, // N preceeded by a
00214         };
00215 
00216         BOOLEAN m_is_active;
00217         ParagraphContext m_context;
00218         
00219         static INT m_char_types[];
00220         static INT m_bidi_types[];
00221         static INT m_weak_state[][10];
00222         static INT m_weak_action[][10];                                       
00223         static INT m_action_neutrals[][5];
00224         static INT m_state_neutrals[][5];
00225         static INT m_add_level[][4];
00226 
00227         INT m_max_length;
00228         BOOLEAN m_alloc_ok;
00229

00242                      INT* pcls,
00243                      INT char_count,
00244                      BOOLEAN whitespace = FALSE);

00279                             INT dir,
00280                             INT* pcls,
00281                             INT* p_level,
00282                             INT char_count, 
00283                             INT depth = 0);
00284     
00293         void ResolveWeak(INT base_level, INT* pcls, INT* p_level, INT char_count);
00294 
00301         void ResolveNeutrals(INT base_level,
00302                              INT* pcls,

00304                              INT char_count);

00311         void ResolveImplicit(const INT* pcls, INT* p_level, INT char_count);
00312 
00321         INT ResolveLines(const WCHAR* dest_text, BOOLEAN* pbrk, INT char_count);
00322 
00333         void ResolveWhitespace(INT base_level, const INT* pcls, INT* p_level, 
00334                                INT char_count);
00335 
00341         INT Reorder(INT base_level,
00342                     WCHAR* dest_text,
00343                     INT* dest_pos,
00344                     const INT* p_level,
00345                     INT char_count,
00346                     INT* cursor_pos);
00347 
00349         INT ReorderLevel(INT level,
00350                          WCHAR* dest_text,
00351                          INT* dest_pos,
00352                          const INT* p_level,
00353                          INT start_idx,
00354                          INT char_count,
00355                          INT* cursor_pos,
00356                          BOOLEAN reverse = FALSE);
00357 
00362         void MirrorText(WCHAR* dest_text, const INT * p_level, INT char_count);
00363 
00365         void WrapLine(INT base_level,
00366                       WCHAR* dest_text,
00367                       INT* dest_pos,
00368                       INT* pcls_line, 
00369                       INT* p_level_line,
00370                       INT char_count,
00371                       BOOLEAN mirror,
00372                       INT* cursor_pos,
00373                       BOOLEAN* pbrk = 0);
00374 
00375         INT ClassFromChN(WCHAR ch);
00376         INT ClassFromChWS(WCHAR ch);
00377         void SetDeferredRun(INT* pval, INT count, INT start, INT value);
00378         INT GreaterEven(INT i);
00379         INT GreaterOdd(INT i);
00380         INT EmbeddingDirection(INT level);
00381         INT GetDeferredType(INT action);
00382         INT GetResolvedType(INT action);
00383         INT GetDeferredNeutrals(INT action, INT level);
00384         INT GetResolvedNeutrals(INT action);
00385 
00386         static BidiManager m_bidi_manager;
00387 };
